text: Great food best Mac & cheese and polish boys in the city. Top 5 barbecue spots in Cleveland

I am a Uber Eats driver and so many of my customers have ordered from Freddies's that I had to try something and get a menu. So I tried a big polish boy and 3 barbecue wings. All was great. They will see me again

Best greens and macaroni and cheese in the city. And that's my word. I could eat here everyday. Tastes like somebody's grandmother is back in the kitchen talking with her sister about news in the Call and Post. Don't sleep on this place. Serious.
